caption.title: IgG isolation from saliva and plasma with high purity.
caption.p: Relative chromatogram area under the curve (AUC) of plasma IgG and saliva IgG SDS page lanes is shown. The bars show the relative fraction of 100-250kDa bands on the total chromatogram AUC for the gel shown in ( Fig 1A). With the IgG Standard (Std) as reference, average Saliva IgG purity is 79% (± 13% SD) and average Plasma IgG purity is 91% (± 9% SD).
